paramInformation.label: Saving load state before power failure

options.label: Save load state before power failure

paramInformation.label: Enable/disable to send the basic report to the Lifeline when the load state changed
Enable/disable over current or over load protection, report alarm when the load is over 16A if enabled

Added to and removed from a network through external
switch (when enabled this function, triple press the external
switch to be added to or removed from a network)
Note: if this function is enabled, when triple press the
switch rapidly, the device will be set to inclusion or
exclusion mode, then device status will not be reported
(basic report) during this process.
Power change absolute threshold report, report when the power change value is over the threshold.

options.label: Value of the power change absolute threshold (1-255), if power change value is over the threshold value, report the power change value using METER_REPORT
Value of the current change absolute threshold (1-255), if current change value is over the threshold value, report the current change value using METER_REPORT
Value of the voltage change absolute threshold (1-255), if voltage change value is over the threshold value, report the voltage change value using METER_REPORT

paramInformation.label: Time cycle to report the values of energy consumption, voltage, current and load power actively

metadata.inclusion:
Triple press the action button on the switch, LED indicator will flash rapidly, it will set the switch into inclusion
mode for 30 seconds, if there is no reply from the gateway, the device will quit inclusion mode after 30 seconds.
2)When the value of parameter 5 is configured as 1, triple press the external switch rapidly within 1.5 seconds,
LED indicator will flash rapidly, it will set the switch into inclusion mode for 30 seconds, if there is no reply from
the gateway, the device will quit inclusion mode after 30 seconds.
The LED indicator will stay solid on for 3 seconds if the device is added to the network successfully. The
indicator will turn off if inclusion fails.
metadata.exclusion:
Triple press the action button on the switch, LED indicator will flash rapidly, it will set the switch into exclusion
mode for 30 seconds, if there is no reply from the gateway, the device will quit exclusion mode after 30 seconds.
2)When the value of parameter 5 is configured as 1, triple press the external switch rapidly within 1.5 seconds,
LED indicator will flash rapidly, it will set the switch into exclusion mode for 30 seconds, if there is no reply from
the gateway, the device will quit exclusion mode after 30 seconds.
metadata.reset: Press and hold down the action button for over 10 seconds, LED indicator flashes slowly, the switch will restart and reset to factory defaults.
